markdown: | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Mapping the Archipelago: The Burning Shoals | conc = | next = | internalname = 03_QST_Cartographer_Five | guid = f730f90f-7733-4c21-8a17-121387773081 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Sanza, the excitable cartographer in Queen's Berth, wants to compile a complete guide to the islands of the Deadfire, but he can't do it on his own. He asks the Watcher to do it. ## Walkthrough * To complete the survey, you need to discover the [Fampyr's Crypt](/fampyrsCrypt/) (also called [Cave of Threshing](/caveOfThreshing/), located northeast of Crookspur), [Kohopa's Fang](/kohopasFang/), and [Outcast's Respite](/outcastsRespite/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/03_Neketaka_Vailian_District/03_QST_Cartographer_Five.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Mapping the Archipelago: Razai Passage''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Sanza, the excitable cartographer I met in Queen's Berth, wants to compile a complete guide to the islands of the Deadfire, but he can't do it on his own. |- | rowspan="5" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Explore the islands near the Razai Passage.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Sanza's map is nearly complete. He has one final task for me, which is to survey the islands to the west of Razai Passage. From Neketaka, I must sail northwest. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | Far to the northwest, I discovered an island boasting a strange altar. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | On a swampy island, I discovered a hut that was home to several bog witches. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | Along the rocky isles that comprise Magran's Teeth, I found a cave inhabited by Flame Naga. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Sanza.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I have completed my survey of the region. With this, Sanza can complete his project. I should find him at his shop in Queen's Berth in Neketaka and let him know. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | Someone critical to the completion of this quest has been killed |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I have mapped the islands by Razai passage - and in so doing, completed Sanza's maritime chart of the Kahanga territories. |}

He asks the Watcher to do it. ==Walkthrough== * To complete the survey, you need to discover the [[Fampyr's Crypt]] (also called [[Cave of Threshing]], located northeast of Crookspur), [[Kohopa's Fang]], and [[Outcast's Respite]]. ==Journal== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/03_Neketaka_Vailian_District/03_QST_Cartographer_Five.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Mapping the Archipelago: Razai Passage''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Sanza, the excitable cartographer I met in Queen's Berth, wants to compile a complete guide to the islands of the Deadfire, but he can't do it on his own. |- | rowspan="5" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Explore the islands near the Razai Passage.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Sanza's map is nearly complete. He has one final task for me, which is to survey the islands to the west of Razai Passage. From Neketaka, I must sail northwest. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | Far to the northwest, I discovered an island boasting a strange altar. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | On a swampy island, I discovered a hut that was home to several bog witches. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | Along the rocky isles that comprise Magran's Teeth, I found a cave inhabited by Flame Naga. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Sanza.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I have completed my survey of the region. With this, Sanza can complete his project. I should find him at his shop in Queen's Berth in Neketaka and let him know. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | Someone critical to the completion of this quest has been killed |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I have mapped the islands by Razai passage - and in so doing, completed Sanza's maritime chart of the Kahanga territories. |}
title: Mapping the Archipelago: Razai Passage
